name: women
text: Women should have the right to choose to have an abortion.

name: partisanship
text: I identify more with the Democratic party than with the Republican party.

name: immigration
text: Immigrants today are a burden on our country because they take our jobs, housing and healthcare.

name: books
text: Physical books are preferable to e-books for recreational reading.

name: cities
text: Cities should invest more in parks and green spaces than in large shopping centers.

name: cars
text: In the future, self-driving cars are preferable to human-driven cars.
